text: how are you today I missed you who

it doesn't matter what color they are
cut them in quarters or have them if

make sure everything's nice and coated

for about 10 minutes over here I have

it takes 3 rinses it takes 3 rinses the
second most important thing after not

greens are very very dry because if

doesn't stick don't stuff it full of

now that my greens are ready I'm gonna
